definitions.text: a secret group organized to overthrow a government or occupation force
an electric railway operating below the surface of the ground (usually in a city)
examples: in Paris the subway system is called the `metro' and in London it is called the `tube' or the `underground'

definitions.text: under the level of the ground
conducted with or marked by hidden aims or methods
in or into hiding or secret operation
beneath the surface of the earth
